name: SteelBound
description:
OVERVIEW

SteelBound is an local co-op, 3D adventure game for two players with an isometric view.

We'll take control of two brothers, sons of Gilgamesh, on his mission to return the cursed sword to its place of origin.

While progressing, they'll face situations that will require them to cooperate constantly, adapting their strategy in seconds.

GAME FEATURES Dynamic roles

You have only one sword, and you must exchange it continuously to progress. The change of the sword will change your roles in the game.

Attack with the sword or control the area without it. Mastering the roles will be fundamental.

Corruption

Be careful with hoarding the sword because this will corrupt, and possibly kill you. Cooperate so that it will not destroy you.

Cooperative progression

You'll face many challenges, and need to help each other to overcome them, be it enemies or intricate puzzles. Cooperation will make you stronger, since the best actions can only be performed by combining the special skills from each role.
